translation.en: [Billie] There was a time in my life when I felt free.
translation.ja: かつての私は⸺ 自由だった

translation.en: And the world was full of possibilities.
translation.ja: 世界は可能性に満ちていて

translation.en: -[Billie] Wait, what are you doing? -Do you want me to stop?
[Billie] Those were the days. People say you don't know them when you're having them, but I knew.
translation.ja: 彼を失う前からその大切さに気づいてた

translation.en: And now, these are the days.
translation.ja: そして これが今の生活

translation.en: Mommy, you said you were feeding her.
translation.ja: おっぱい あげないの？
寝てるよ そうじゃないの

translation.en: You know what? I fell asleep for, like, a second.
translation.ja: そうじゃないの ちょっとウトウトしただけ

translation.en: -But what do you need? -I want to show you something.
translation.ja: なあに？ 見せたいものがあるの

translation.en: [chuckling] What do you wanna show me?
What have you got there, honey?
Baby. You can't keep him like that, sweetheart. You have to let him go.
translation.ja: 閉じ込めちゃダメよ放してあげて
そうなのね　でも放して

translation.en: And she's mine. I love her.
I know, sweetheart. But she can't breathe in there.
translation.ja: でもビンの中じゃ息ができない

translation.en: And she's gonna die if you don't let her out.
translation.ja: そのままだと死んじゃうわ

translation.en: Come here. Come with me. Let's go sit down.
translation.ja: おいで　座りましょう

translation.en: Okay, now. I have an idea.
translation.ja: じゃあ こうしましょう

translation.en: Let's see which way she goes, okay?
translation.ja: この子の行く先を一緒に考えるの

translation.en: Thousands of miles for the winter.
Where's my babies? Get over here, bud.
Come on. Where are they? Come here, bud.
-My word, you are so gigantic and cute. -[Hudson laughing]
translation.ja: 大きくなったなかわいい巨人め

translation.en: Oh, I can barely hold you up!
translation.ja: パパはもう抱っこできないよ

translation.en: Oh, there she is. There's my beautiful girl.
translation.ja: 僕のお姫様は そこか
ただいま パパだよ

translation.en: I was gonna get dressed at some point, I swear. I just--
translation.ja: 私も着替えようと思ってたんだけど…

translation.en: All right. I'm gonna hurry up and mow the lawn before the game starts.
translation.ja: 試合の前に草刈りをしよう
平気か？ ええ　大丈夫
ええ　大丈夫 いくぞ

translation.en: [Billie] My husband is as gorgeous inside as out.
translation.ja: クーパーは内面も外見も最高

translation.en: I've never caught him looking at another woman.
translation.ja: 他の女性に目移りしないし

translation.en: Hell, I've never even caught him in a lie.
Oh, God, Billie, things have been so crazy at work.
translation.ja: 参ったよ ビリー このところ 職場は大混乱だ
このところ 職場は大混乱だ

translation.en: I mean, we're talking like, it's, like, post-merger madness, you know?
translation.ja: 合併のあとによく起きるゴタゴタだよ

translation.en: Everybody's just angling for a position
translation.ja: みんなポジション争いをしてる

translation.en: and they're all trying to show off for the new boss.
translation.ja: 新しい上司の前で点数を稼ぎたいのさ

translation.en: And she's great, though, you know? She's--
She wants to expand internationally. She wants to do all those things I've wanted to do,
translation.ja: 僕がやりたかったことを大きなスケールで⸺

translation.en: just on a-- I don't know, like a much, much larger scale.
translation.ja: 僕がやりたかったことを大きなスケールで⸺ 実現しようとしてる

translation.en: You know, people are swarming, but she sees me, I can feel it.
translation.ja: 彼女のお気に入りは僕さ分かるんだ

translation.en: My new boss. Come on. Have you listened to a word I said?
translation.ja: 新しい上司さ　話しただろ
そうね やあ　フランチェスカ
やあ　フランチェスカ

translation.en: [Billie] The problem is Cooper Connelly is married to me.
translation.ja: 問題はクーパーの妻が私だってこと

translation.en: I'd been contorted into at least 73% of the positions in the Kama Sutra.
translation.ja: カーマ･スートラに出てくる大半の体位を経験した

translation.en: And every other kind of bad boy deliciousness you can imagine.
translation.ja: あらゆるワルい男との情事を楽しんだ

translation.en: We'll just talk tomorrow and set a time, then we'll discuss.
All right, great. Thanks. We'll see you then. Bye.
translation.ja: ありがとう　また明日

translation.en: So why go marry someone so straight-laced?
translation.ja: まじめな男と結婚した理由？

translation.en: I didn't call you back for a reason!
I see a lot of women.
You never appreciated anything that I did.
translation.ja: いつも私を見下してる

translation.en: My nerves were so fucking shot by the time I met Cooper, my heart was riding on fumes.
translation.ja: クーパーと出会った時私は疲れ果ててた

translation.en: And the stability and sanity he offered
was a soothing balm to my spent, scorched soul.
translation.ja: 擦り切れた心の痛みを癒やしてくれた

translation.en: I'll never forget the first time he brought me to this house.
translation.ja: この家に来た時のことは忘れない
“コネティカット”は先住民の言葉で⸺

translation.en: It's like he'd been waiting for me. For us.
translation.ja: 彼は運命の人だと思った

translation.en: Can't have you tracking snow in the house, come on, now.
translation.ja: 家に雪を入れないようにね

translation.en: He cooked me this incredible meal.
translation.ja: 彼の手料理は最高だった

translation.en: How could you not fall in love with this guy?
translation.ja: 恋に落ちないほうが無理

translation.en: It's nice to finally meet you.
I've heard so much about the both of you. I'm a big fan of your daughter's. Clearly.
translation.ja: 僕は娘さんの大ファンなんです
私たちもだ 違う時もあるわ
冗談だよ さあね　本気かも

translation.en: [Billie] Cooper is the kind of guy who actually enjoys dinner with your parents.
translation.ja: 私の両親との食事も楽しんでくれた

translation.en: [man over PA] This is North Station. North Station.
Ma'am, ma'am. Why don't you sit right here?
[Billie] He stands on the train, no matter how many seats are empty.
translation.ja: 彼は空席があっても人に席を譲る

translation.en: manages to be the most handsome and humble man in any room.
translation.ja: どんな場にいても誰よりもハンサムで謙虚

translation.en: never thought I'd leave Morgan Stanley to come be one of the good guys.
translation.ja: 思いがけずいい仲間と出会えた

translation.en: But Cooper sucked me in with his "change the world" hoo-ha.
translation.ja: “世界を変えよう”とクーパーに誘われたんだ

translation.en: And the dental plan's not that bad either.
translation.ja: 歯の治療プラン付きでね

translation.en: -But we have had a very big year. -We have.
translation.ja: ともかく今年は大変だった そうだな

translation.en: High risk, high reward, so huzzah to you.
translation.ja: リスクも見返りも大きかった 頑張ったな

translation.en: -Merry fucking Christmas, dude. -Thanks, buddy. Appreciate you.
translation.ja: メリークリスマス ありがとう

translation.en: [Billie] He is my all-time favorite person.
translation.ja: 世界でいちばん好きな人

translation.en: And I want us to live a hundred years and die at the exact same moment.
translation.ja: 100年間 共に生きて同じ瞬間に死にたい

translation.en: I know, I know. Okay, go see Mommy. Go see Mommy. Hey, bud!
translation.ja: そうか　ママに会いたいよな

translation.en: [Billie] And I want our souls to find each other on the other side as soon as possible,
translation.ja: あの世でも早くお互いの魂を見つけ出し

translation.en: so we can fall in love and make more babies,
translation.ja: 恋をしてたくさん子供を作りたい

translation.en: and do it all over again.
translation.ja: もう一度 人生を共にするの

translation.en: I just also want him to fuck my brains out.
translation.ja: それに強く抱かれたい

translation.en: Is that so much to ask?
Didn't you have the, um...? No, no, no! Stop him!
translation.ja: 今夜は… おい　そいつを止めろ！

translation.en: I'm sorry. Didn't you have the--? The girls night in tonight?
translation.ja: 今夜は友達と会うんだろ？
遅刻できる ああ　そうか
ああ　そうか ええ　問題ないわ

translation.en: Oh, it's so good. That feels so good.
Yeah, no, don't stop. Don't stop. Keep going.
translation.ja: ああ　その調子で続けて
分かった そのまま

translation.en: -Sorry. I'm sorry. -Just-- Okay, just get the vibrator.
translation.ja: ごめん もういい　バイブ取って

translation.en: [Billie] It's been 18 months since Cooper went down on me, for example.
translation.ja: なめてくれたのは18ヵ月も前

translation.en: I expelled an entire human being from my body in half that time.
translation.ja: その半分の時間で私は新たな命を生んだ

translation.en: -Do you want me to, uh--? -It's fine.
But then you have one kid. And then another.
I used to simply accept Cooper's waning passion as proof.
translation.ja: 夫の性欲の衰えは仕方ないと思ってた

translation.en: This is what happens when you grow up, get married, get into a routine.
translation.ja: 家庭を持てば誰もがこうなるんだと

translation.en: Now I'm screaming at him from inside my head,
translation.ja: 心の中では夫に叫んでる

translation.en: trying to make him feel something.
translation.ja: この気持ちに気づいてほしい

translation.en: Mommy. You didn't kiss me good night.
translation.ja: ママ　おやすみのキスして

translation.en: Well, you didn't check on me.
translation.ja: ううん　忘れてるよ

translation.en: Come here. Come here, baby. Come here. Come on.

translation.ja: どうしたの？ 何でもない
泣かないで　ママ 大丈夫だから

translation.en: I want you to come and tuck me in whenever you're done.
translation.ja: ベッドまでついてきて
起きてた？ 当然でしょ

translation.en: This stupid band hasn't even gone on yet,
translation.ja: バンドの演奏はこれからだもの

translation.en: and I'm too obsessed to give up, go home, get a decent night's sleep,
translation.ja: バンドの演奏はこれからだもの 社会人みたいに⸺

translation.en: like any grown-ass woman who had to get out of bed at 7 a.m. and go to work would.
translation.ja: 家でおとなしく寝るなんて私には無理

translation.en: Hey, has Cooper ever choked you?
translation.ja: 首絞めプレイの経験は？

translation.en: -'Cause if he hasn't, he needs to. -Oh, my God.
translation.ja: 試してみて まさか…

translation.en: Didn't one of your exes used to do it?
-Oh, honey. You need to be choked. -Oh!

translation.ja: 気持ちいい？ とっても

translation.en: Maybe we should get married. He could choke me for the next seven to ten years.
translation.ja: 10年だけアレックスと結婚しようかな

translation.en: I love that erotic asphyxiation is what it takes
to finally get Sasha Snow to settle down.
translation.ja: あのサーシャがついに年貢を納めるわけね

translation.en: Uh-uh. For seven to ten years. Let's not go crazy.
translation.ja: 10年だけ　勘違いしないで

translation.en: So, girl, you want to tell me what's really going on?

translation.ja: 当たり前よ そうじゃない

translation.en: I don't feel like myself. I feel like, uh...
translation.ja: 自分を見失った気がする

translation.en: Like a watered-down, wife-mom version of me. And...
translation.ja: 個性が消え⸺ 妻や母親の役割に染まってる

translation.en: I'm just not sure that this is who I'm supposed to be.
translation.ja: 本当にこれでいいのかなって

translation.en: Oh, God. You need to go back to work.
You clearly have too much time on your hands.
Cooper and I agreed that I would take this time to be with the kids.
translation.ja: 育児に専念すると夫婦で決めた

translation.en: -Please. Where do I even start? -I wanted this time, you know?
translation.ja: それが問題？ 私が望んだの

translation.en: I thought I would love it. And I do but...
translation.ja: 実際 育児は楽しいけど…

translation.en: It's not enough. It's okay. You can say it.
translation.ja: それだけじゃ不満だと言えばいい

translation.en: I've been thinking a lot, about...
translation.ja: いつも思い出すの その…

translation.en: Do not fuck up your gorgeous family.
translation.ja: 家庭を壊しちゃダメよ

translation.en: -I'm not. -Cooper is such a good guy.
translation.ja: まさか いい夫がいるのに

translation.en: Then appreciate it for a second, how lucky you are to have found him.
translation.ja: 自分の幸せに感謝しなさい

translation.en: How many millions of women would kill for what you have.
translation.ja: 多くの女性のあこがれを手にした

translation.en: But I just-- I can't stop thinking about how things used to be.
translation.ja: でも⸺ 忘れられないの
ブラッドを？ 違う　かつての自分をよ
違う　かつての自分をよ
私どうしたんだろう 待って

translation.en: You said yes, moved to the burbs, had kids.
translation.ja: 結婚も郊外に越したのも子供を生んだのも⸺

translation.en: This is what you wanted, B. It was your choice.
translation.ja: 全部 自分の選んだ道でしょ

translation.en: I know. And I know Cooper's exhausted, you know?
I'm exhausted too, but I just--
translation.ja: 夫も私も疲れてるわでも…

translation.en: Some small piece of that magical...
translation.ja: あの… 魔法のような感覚を少しでも…
身も心もつながって愛を感じたい

translation.en: You know? It was just-- It was such a high!
Sash, are you--? Are you even listening to me?
Yes. Now you listen to me, all right?
translation.ja: そっちこそ話を聞いて

translation.en: Brad was one sexy motherfucker. But that kind of love is a fickle bitch.
translation.ja: ブラッドみたいな男の愛は気まぐれよ

translation.en: It hurts, betrays and is ultimately unsustainable.
translation.ja: 痛みと裏切りを伴う不安定な恋愛

translation.en: What you have with Cooper will go the distance.
translation.ja: クーパーとの関係とは大違いよ

translation.en: I know. I know it in my cells, I know it in my fucking soul.
translation.ja: そんなこと身に染みて分かってるわよ
ドーパミンやアドレナリンと同じ

translation.en: But I can get that feeling again.
Every time I close my eyes and go back to one of those nights, I feel it.
translation.ja: 過ぎた夜を思い出すと感覚がよみがえるの

translation.en: It's not some elusive high I'm chasing.
translation.ja: 幻なんかじゃなく本当にハイになれる

translation.en: It's real. And it was a whole other me.
translation.ja: 幻なんかじゃなく本当にハイになれる 昔の私は今と まるで別人だった

translation.en: You glam-goddess-Barbie'd your ass and I am digging it!
translation.ja: あんたのグラマーなお尻大好きよ

translation.en: [Billie] Sasha Snow is smart as shit.
translation.ja: サーシャは ずば抜けた才女

translation.en: The only one of us who actually finished her PhD
translation.ja: 仲間内で唯一博士課程を修了し

translation.en: and is now a fancy psych professor at our alma mater.
translation.ja: 今は心理学の教授をしてる

translation.en: most unapologetic woman you'll ever meet.
translation.ja: 誰よりも肝の座った女性

translation.en: And all that wildness brought us downtown,
almost every Saturday night to the Ludlow Street Cafe,
translation.ja: ラドロー･ストリート･カフェに繰り出した

translation.en: and one equally wild lead singer, drummer, bassist after another.
translation.ja: お目当ては⸺ サーシャ同様ギラついたバンドマンたち サーシャ同様ギラついたバンドマンたち 〝ラドロー･ストリート･カフェ〞
なめてほしい？ ああ　頼むよ

translation.en: Oh, yeah, totally. I'm like what, like a hundred blocks away from home?
translation.ja: うん　家は遠いけどね

translation.en: I'll see you later. Love you.
Put your hand on my head again, I'll bite the whole thing off.
translation.ja: 頭を触ったらかみ切る

translation.en: Sure do. Let me know if you find one.
translation.ja: ええ　見つけたら教えて

translation.en: Here. Go get something to eat.
Your friend said you might need a ride.

translation.ja: まあ　そんなところだ

translation.en: Car's parked over there if you want.

translation.ja: 乗らないならサヨナラだ

translation.en: In the city? Okay-- Okay, no one drives in the city.
translation.ja: ここで車を持てるのはひと握りの人よ

translation.en: How do you find parking or justify the cost?
translation.ja: 駐車場は少ないし料金は高い

translation.en: To the environment, for starters? I mean, not to mention--
translation.ja: まだ若いのに どうやって…

translation.en: You want a ride or what?
Okay, so you're not with the band. You're not exactly a roadie.
translation.ja: バンドのメンバーじゃないのね

translation.en: Not exactly, no. I own a record label that's trying to sign them.
translation.ja: 俺の会社が彼らとの契約を狙ってる

translation.en: And this car, a place around the corner, this jacket, these boots.
translation.ja: あとは車と家上着とブーツも持ってる

translation.en: That is why you're sucking up to him like this by doing his betty a solid.
translation.ja: だから彼の連れ合いの頼みを聞いた

translation.en: She's a hard lady to say no to.
translation.ja: 彼女に頼まれると断りづらくて

translation.en: But still, you're driving home her friend, which means that that dude's got leverage.
translation.ja: それもあるけどコシの才能が理由でしょ

translation.en: Yeah, for now, but he shouldn't get used to it,
translation.ja: ああ　だが今回限りだ

translation.en: and neither should you 'cause chauffeur is not my MO.
To think of you in the middle of--
translation.ja: アレの最中に君を気遣ってた
ええ　一番の親友よ

translation.en: We were roommates together in grad school at Columbia.
translation.ja: コロンビア大学の同級生でルームメイト

translation.en: You know, you might start lecturing me about my mean mommy
translation.ja: 母親からの愛情不足を指摘し⸺

translation.en: and how much better adjusted I'd be if only she had held me more.
translation.ja: 愛があれば俺もまともになれたと言うんだろ

translation.en: What, is that what you think?
I think you like nice shit because either you grew up with it or you didn't.
translation.ja: 美しいものが好きなのはそれに囲まれて育ったから

translation.en: And you own a record label, so I'm gonna guess that you had a leg up on that, mate.
translation.ja: 会社を持ってるってことは裕福な家の出身ね

translation.en: But you found your way to the Big Apple. You didn't stay behind to take care of the family kiwi farm.
translation.ja: でも家業は継がずニューヨークに来た

translation.en: So that is a classic "fuck you" to either Mom or Dad,
translation.ja: 両親のどちらかに反抗してる

translation.en: but I'm guessing, um, with that hair and those rings,
translation.ja: あなたの髪型と指輪から推察するに⸺ 女性的なものに抵抗はなさそう

translation.en: that you didn't have trouble with your feminine side.
translation.ja: 女性的なものに抵抗はなさそう

translation.en: So Daddy dearest it is, then.
translation.ja: つまり反抗の相手は父親ね

translation.en: Sure. Yeah, did you have some place in mind?
translation.ja: いいわよ　場所の当ては？

translation.en: Just the jacket and the boots, huh?
And you have a stage in your living room.
translation.ja: リビングにはステージまであるのね

translation.en: I own a record label. Yeah, sometimes I like my guys to play here.
translation.ja: 時々 所属バンドに演奏させるのさ
変な街だわ ああ　最高にぶっ飛んでる
ああ　最高にぶっ飛んでる

translation.en: You know, when I was little...
I used to dream about living in New York City.
translation.ja: ニューヨーク暮らしにあこがれた

translation.en: I never thought I actually would, but now that I'm here...
translation.ja: 意外にも夢がかなって…

translation.en: There's a lot of shrinky dinks here.
There's a lot of screwed up people too, so you've got your work cut out.
translation.ja: 道を踏み外した奴も多いから大変だろ

translation.en: I'm just not sure that I actually do.
translation.ja: できてるか分からない

translation.en: you do it every goddamn day.
You said you like New York.
translation.ja: この街が好きなんだろ

translation.en: I thought you deserved to see her like this.
translation.ja: 眺めを楽しんでくれ 私…

translation.en: This is not how I thought my night was gonna end.
translation.ja: こんなふうに今日を終えるなんて

translation.en: Well, the night's not over yet.
[Billie] It's crazy, but I started to believe this could be my life.
translation.ja: 愚かにも⸺ 私はこれが自分の人生だと思った

translation.en: I prayed that it would never be anything other than this.
translation.ja: 他の生き方はしたくないと天に祈った

translation.en: [Billie] I shouldn't have. But I did.
translation.ja: 信じちゃダメな相手を信じた

translation.en: [Billie] And eventually, he trusted me too.
translation.ja: 最後には彼も私を信じた
彼との行為は刺激的で⸺

translation.en: I got off on the fact that I was the only person on planet Earth...
translation.ja: 固い殻に閉ざされた彼の素顔を知るのは⸺

translation.en: who got to see what was underneath his rock-hard shell.
translation.ja: 地球上で私だけだと悦に入っていたの

translation.en: And the truth is, I miss it.

translation.ja: 君は⸺ 一体誰なんだ？

translation.en: Is that what you want, huh?

translation.ja: やめないで　お願い

translation.en: No, no, no. Keep going. Keep going, don't stop. Don't stop.
translation.ja: やめないで　お願い このまま続けて

translation.en: I have to go to work.
I know this is last minute. But any chance you're available to come sit the kids today?
translation.ja: 急な依頼で悪いけど今日 子守を頼める？

translation.en: Yes. Oh, thank you. Thank you so much.
translation.ja: ありがとう　助かるわ

translation.en: Are you headed into the city too?
We're playing hooky, off to Radio City.
translation.ja: 私たちラジオ･シティに行くの

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I just-- I can't.
translation.ja: せっかくだけど行けないの
せっかくだけど行けないの あら　どうしたの？

translation.en: My mom-- My mother is, um... very ill.
translation.ja: 母の体調が かなり悪くて
ごめんね いいのよ　力になるわ

translation.en: -Just let us help you. -Oh, no, no. You can't.
translation.ja: いいのよ　力になるわ いいえ　大丈夫

translation.en: Have a-- Have a great time.
-What the hell are you doing? -I don't know.
translation.ja: どうしたの？ 私にも分からない

translation.en: Oh, my God. I'm like, I'm--
translation.ja: どうしよう　私ったら⸺

translation.en: I can't breathe and I just, I feel like-- I don't know.
Like I just need, like-- It's...
translation.ja: どう言えばいいか分からないけど…
